title: Refund a Pay Now payment
description: Refunds a Pay Now payment where the authenticated user is the seller.
permission_required: MyTradeMeWrite: Maintain your watchlist, answer questions and post comments.

fields.name: ListingId
fields.description:
The ID of the listing to refund.

                                This field is retained for backwards compatibility; please use PurchaseId instead.

fields.name: OfferId
fields.description:
The ID of the fixed price offer. Defaults to zero (i.e. no fixed price offer).

                                This field is retained for backwards compatibility; please use PurchaseId instead.

fields.name: RefundAmount
fields.description: The dollar value to refund, up to the original value of the auction. Defaults to refunding the full value of the original purchase.

fields.name: PurchaseId
fields.description: The ID of the purchase to refund. If this is provided, ListingId and OfferId must not be present.

returns.description: <PayNowRefundResponse> Details on whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Success
fields.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

fields.name: Description
fields.description: The description of the error, if the operation failed.

fields.name: StatusCode
fields.description: The status code indicating what went wrong if the operation failed.

enum.name: InvalidAmount
enum.description: The refund amount was too large or too small.

enum.name: NotTheSeller
enum.description: The caller is not the seller of the auction.

enum.name: NotBoughtUsingPayNow
enum.description: The auction did not use PayNow.

enum.name: AlreadyChargedBack
enum.description: The payment has already been charged back.

enum.name: AlreadyRefunded
enum.description: The payment has already been refunded.

enum.name: RefundDeclined
enum.description: The refund was declined by the payment provider.

enum.name: RefundFailed
enum.description: There was a failure while processing the refund.
